Playstations.name: Acrylic Paints
Playstations.description: High-quality acrylic paints perfect for a range of artistic projects, providing smooth coverage and vibrant colors.

Playstations.name: Blending Tools
Playstations.description: Essential tools for blending and smoothing different mediums like pastels, charcoal, and pencil.

Playstations.name: Canvas
Playstations.description: Sturdy and durable canvas, ideal for oil, acrylic, and mixed media painting.

Playstations.name: Graphite Pencils
Playstations.description: Premium graphite pencils for detailed sketches and fine lines, available in multiple hardness levels.

Playstations.name: Charcoal
Playstations.description: Soft charcoal sticks for rich, dark shading and texture, perfect for expressive drawings.

Playstations.name: Palette Knife
Playstations.description: Versatile palette knives for mixing paints or applying thick textures in oil and acrylic painting.

Playstations.name: Markers
Playstations.description: Set of high-quality markers that provide vibrant and consistent color for various art techniques.

Playstations.name: Oil Paints
Playstations.description: Rich oil paints with a smooth consistency, perfect for creating deep, vibrant artworks.

Playstations.name: Paintbrush Set
Playstations.description: Complete set of brushes in various shapes and sizes for all types of painting techniques.

Playstations.name: Sketchpad
Playstations.description: High-quality sketchpad with textured paper, suitable for a variety of drawing mediums.
